item.title: Predicting Failures of LLMs to Link Biomedical Ontology Terms to Identifiers Evidence Across Models and Ontologies
item.description: arXiv:2509.04458v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Large language models often perform well on biomedical NLP tasks but may fail to link ontology terms to their correct identifiers.
